ctx: intros d a b H n.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros d a b H n.
intros d a b H n.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros d a b H n. destruct H as [Hcd Hdiv]. split. - split. + apply Nat.mul_divide_mono_r with (p:=n) in Hcd. apply Hcd. + intros d' Hcd'. apply Hdiv in Hcd'. apply divides_plus; auto. - intros d' Hcd'. apply Hdiv in Hcd'. apply divides_mul_cancel_r with (n:=n) in Hcd'. auto.
